gUI
Class MainWindow

java.lang.Object
  gUI.MainWindow

public class MainWindow
extends Object

This class displays the main window GUI. It displays a window with the main game display as well as buttons along the side which allows the simulation to be set up. There is also a button to adjust the speed of the game, as well as a button that allows the user to run contests.

Author:
wjs25

setupNewWorldStandardWorld

protected void setupNewWorldStandardWorld(int rows,
                                          int cols,
                                          int rocks)
                                   throws ErrorEvent
Sets up and displays a new standard world in the main window.

Parameters:
rows - The height in hexagons.
cols - The width in hexagons.
rocks - The number of rocks.
Throws:
ErrorEvent - When the world generation fails.

Sets up and displays a new contest world in the main window.

Throws:

notifyGameComplete

protected void notifyGameComplete(GameStats gameStats)
To be called when the game is complete. Modifies the window to initial configuration as well as providing the user with the option of viewing statistics.

Parameters:
gameStats - The stats of the game.

updateLiveStats

protected void updateLiveStats(int round,
                               int blackAnthillFood,
                               int redAnthillFood)
Updates the main window with current stats from the game.

Parameters:
round - The current round.
blackAnthillFood - Amount of food in the black ant hill.
redAnthillFood - Amount of food in the red ant hill.
